title: and remember I will be with you always, even until the end of time
content: Graduation project, made entirely in touchdesigner. In the contemporary world, online content can be consulted instantly. It became more accessible than the physical world and formed a hyperreal, collective mind in which rare and unique experiences are predominant. In this installation, the viewer is immersed in a collection of viral found-footage videos that picture the beauty of ‘true’ nature, shot by a someone that hopelessly hides behind the screen, seeking for the comfort of an anonymous spectator.

title: moving still av
content: DJ mix accompanied by video’s taken from publicly available IP cams throughout the Netherlands, recorded in October 2020.

title: fokke de wit

title: knekelhuis

title: puer parasitus
content: assistance on building a cargo site

title: kanaal40
content: Corona project for Garage Noord on building a website inspired by early TMF and MTV tv shows called https://kanaal40.com/. On the site users could join a chatbox by sending a text to the kanaal40 phone number to see it appear in the chat. Website is unfortunately not online anymore and now replaced by a new site called https://kanaal40.tv/

title: not at home
content: A new project, still in progress. The site will be online soon!

title: donker tapes field trip
content: DJ mix with Heleen Swart as part of our monthly radioshow on Stranded FM called Donker Radio. This project later developed into Donker Tapes, an experimental platform for music & arts. We had multiple live evenings at Garage Noord and some experimental live streams on our own site, which looked different every time ;p

title: ly foulidis at donker tapes
content: Curated live show by LY Foulidis, recorded in our then-home in Wormer, NL. Live mixed on a cube-tv age videomixer and streamed to an interactive site where you could draw on the video.

title: daisy daisy
content: Registration of a live show of my old band Daisy Daisy in Kapitaal in 2021

title: supernature
content: Launch video of my first concept called Supernature. With this video we announced a series of art launches.

title: heal by global charming
